VPD_WELLBEINGCOMMENTS: Tom requires support due to dementia, but is in good care.
VPD_NOMINALSVIEW: Tom acknowledged understanding of the situation despite dementia.

VPD_NOMINALSYNOPSIS: Tom, an 82-year-old with dementia, has not maintained contact with his close friends for an extended period. His condition necessitates regular support, yet he consistently fails to engage with those around him, making it difficult for his caregivers to ensure his wellbeing. Despite several attempts to communicate with him, he remains distant and unresponsive, potentially exacerbating his vulnerability and raising concerns among his acquaintances about his safety and ability to manage daily tasks independently.
VPD_WELLBEINGCOMMENTS: Tom requires support due to dementia and does not engage.
VPD_NOMINALSVIEW: Tom denies understanding the situation due to dementia.

VPD_NOMINALSYNOPSIS: Tom's son is concerned as dementia prevents him from engaging with authorities.
VPD_WELLBEINGCOMMENTS: Tom is cared for but does not engage with authorities.
VPD_NOMINALSVIEW: Tom unable to comprehend situation due to dementia.
